languages.text: {n}Однако солдаты не стремятся бросаться в бой. Их недоверчивые взгляды мечутся между Комиссаром и {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}известным героем Империума{/d}, посмевшим выступить против него.{/n}

{n}However, the soldiers seem hesitant to comply. They glance back and forth distrustfully between the Commissar and the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}known hero of the Imperium{/d} who has challenged him.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Однако солдаты не стремятся бросаться в бой. Их недоверчивые взгляды мечутся между Комиссаром и {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}известным героем Империума{/d}, посмевшим выступить против него.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}However, the soldiers seem hesitant to comply. They glance back and forth with distrust between the Commissar and the known hero of the Imperium who has challenged him.{/n}
{n}However, the soldiers seem hesitant to comply. They glance back and forth with distrust between the Commissar and the known hero of the Imperium who has challenged him.{/n}
{n}However, the soldiers seem hesitant to comply. They glance back and forth distrustfully between the Commissar and the known hero of the Imperium who has challenged him.{/n}
{n}However, the soldiers seem hesitant to comply. They glance back and forth distrustfully between the Commissar and the known hero of the Imperium who has challenged him.{/n}

{n}However, the soldiers seem hesitant to comply. They glance back and forth distrustfully between the Commissar and the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}known hero of the Imperium{/d} who has challenged him.{/n}

languages.text: {n}然而，士兵们似乎不太愿意服从他的命令。他们带着不信任的目光，来回打量着政委以及曾经挑战过他的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}帝国著名英雄{/d}。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}However, the soldiers seem hesitant to comply. They glance back and forth distrustfully between the Commissar and the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}known hero of the Imperium{/d} who has challenged him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}然而，士兵们似乎不太愿意服从他的命令。他们带着不信任的目光，来回打量着政委以及曾经挑战过他的帝国英雄。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Doch die Soldaten zögern. Sie blicken misstrauisch zwischen dem Kommissar und {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}{mf|dem berühmten Helden des Imperiums|der berühmten Heldin des Imperiums}{/d} {mf|hin und her, der|hin und her, die} ihn herausgefordert hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}However, the soldiers seem hesitant to comply. They glance back and forth distrustfully between the Commissar and the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}known hero of the Imperium{/d} who has challenged him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Doch die Soldaten zögern. Sie blicken misstrauisch zwischen dem Kommissar und {mf|dem berühmten Helden des Imperiums hin und her, der|der berühmten Heldin des Imperiums hin und her, die} ihn herausgefordert hat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les soldats, cependant, hésitent à obtempérer. L'air méfiant, ils regardent tour à tour le commissaire et {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}{mf|le héros|l'héroïne} de l'Imperium{/d} qui a osé le défier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}However, the soldiers seem hesitant to comply. They glance back and forth distrustfully between the Commissar and the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}known hero of the Imperium{/d} who has challenged him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les soldats, cependant, hésitent à obtempérer. L'air méfiant, ils regardent tour à tour le commissaire et {mf|le héros|l'héroïne} de l'Imperium qui a osé le défier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sin embargo, los soldados dudan a la hora de obedecer. Su mirada desconfiada va del Comisario {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}a{mf|l famoso héroe| la famosa heroína}{/d} del Imperium que lo desafía.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}However, the soldiers seem hesitant to comply. They glance back and forth distrustfully between the Commissar and the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}known hero of the Imperium{/d} who has challenged him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sin embargo, los soldados dudan a la hora de obedecer. Su mirada desconfiada va del Comisario a{mf|l famoso héroe| la famosa heroína} del Imperium que lo desafía.{/n}

languages.text: {n}しかし、兵士たちはそれに応じるのをためらっているようだ。彼らはコミッサーと、彼に挑戦した{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}帝国の英雄{/d}のどちらにつくべきか迷っているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}However, the soldiers seem hesitant to comply. They glance back and forth distrustfully between the Commissar and the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}known hero of the Imperium{/d} who has challenged him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}しかし、兵士たちはそれに応じるのをためらっているようだ。彼らはコミッサーと、彼に挑戦した{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}帝国の英雄{/d}のどちらにつくべきか迷っているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Askerler, talimatlara uyuyormuş gibi görünmüyor. Güvenmeyen gözlerle bir Komiser'e bir de ona kafa tutan {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}İmparatorluk{/d} kahramanına bakıyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}However, the soldiers seem hesitant to comply. They glance back and forth distrustfully between the Commissar and the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}known hero of the Imperium{/d} who has challenged him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Askerler talimatlara uyuyor gibi görünmüyorlar. Güvenmeyen gözlerle bir Komiser'e, bir de {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}İmparatorluk'un şanı buralara kadar gelmiş{/d}, ona kafa tutan kahramanına bakıyorlar.{/n}
